top.title: Reclaiming Retail Profitability With AI-Driven Pricing and Assortment Optimization
top.snippet: By running dynamic scenarios, AI allows retailers to anticipate tariff impacts and adjust pricing with precision, ensuring costs are recovered
top.rerankWhy: Focuses on AI-driven pricing and assortment optimization
top.aiSummary: AI-driven pricing and assortment optimization can help retailers reclaim profitability by allowing them to anticipate tariff impacts and adjust pricing with precision through dynamic scenarios. This ensures costs are recovered effectively.

top.title: Ecommerce Trends: How Walmart is using AI
top.snippet:
As new Walmart CEO John Furner prepares to take over from Doug McMillon in February, Furner can expect the retail giant’s artificial intelligence (AI) and agentic commerce strategies to come up frequently as he decides how to best put agents and machine learning to use. “Every job we’ve got is going to change in some […]
The post Ecommerce Trends: How Walmart is using AI appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
top.rerankWhy: Insights on Walmart's AI strategies for ecommerce
top.aiSummary: AI is a key focus for Walmart as new CEO John Furner takes over, with plans to utilize agents and machine learning in various job roles. This article from Digital Commerce 360 discusses Walmart's AI and agentic commerce strategies under the new leadership.

top.title: Microsoft introduces agentic AI tools to automate retail and B2B commerce operations
top.snippet:
Microsoft has announced a new set of agentic artificial intelligence (AI) tools to Copilot aimed at automating core retail and B2B commerce functions, including digital checkout, product data management, merchandising and store operations. The company said it designed the agentic AI tools, which it’s delivering through Microsoft Copilot and Copilot Studio, to reduce manual work, […]

top.aiSummary:

Microsoft has unveiled agentic AI tools through Copilot to automate retail and B2B commerce tasks, such as digital checkout and product data management, aiming to streamline operations and reduce manual work.

top.title: Most consumers interacted with AI customer service during holiday shopping

top.title: Spangle AI raises $15 million to build agentic infrastructure for ecommerce
top.snippet:
Spangle AI has raised $15 million in funding to expand its artificial intelligence platform that it designed to connect AI-driven product discovery with real-time online conversion. NewRoad Capital Partners led the Spangle AI funding round. Madrona, DNX Ventures, Streamlined Ventures and strategic angel investors participated as well. The financing brings Spangle’s total funding to $21 […]
The post Spangle AI raises $15 million to build agentic infrastructure for ecommerce appeared first on Digi...
top.rerankWhy: Funding for AI infrastructure in ecommerce

Spangle AI has secured $15 million in funding to enhance its AI platform for connecting product discovery with online conversion in ecommerce. The funding round was led by NewRoad Capital Partners, with participation from Madrona, DNX Ventures, Streamlined Ventures, and strategic angel investors.

top.title: US e-commerce spend reached nearly $258B over the holidays
top.snippet: Adobe Analytics data found consumer spending grew 6.8% compared to 2024, with buy now, pay later usage reaching a new high.
top.rerankWhy: Highlights significant holiday ecommerce spending growth
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
US e-commerce spending during the holidays in 2025 reached almost $258 billion, showing a 6.8% increase from the previous year, according to Adobe Analytics. Additionally, buy now, pay later services saw a surge in usage.

top.title: December sales drop over 2% at small retail businesses despite traffic bump
top.snippet: Even at the holidays shoppers prioritized essentials, and inflation-adjusted discretionary sales at smaller stores fell 1.8% year on year, per Fiserv.
top.rerankWhy: Discusses sales drop despite increased traffic
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
In December 2026, small retail businesses experienced a sales drop of over 2% despite an increase in foot traffic, with inflation-adjusted discretionary sales falling by 1.8% compared to the previous year, according to Fiserv data reported by Retail Dive.

top.title: Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026
top.snippet:
As we enter into 2026, inflation rates are increasing as prices continued to edge up at the end of last year. According to the British Retail Consortium, shop price inflation picked up to 0.7% year on year in December, against growth of 0.6% in November. This is in line with the 3-month average of 0.7%. […]
The post Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026 appeared first on Professional Jeweller.
top.rerankWhy: Discusses inflation impact on retail pricing
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Inflation rates are on the rise in 2026, with shop price inflation reaching 0.7% year on year in December, according to the British Retail Consortium. This trend is expected to continue, impacting the jewellery industry.

top.title: Jewellery designer Solange Azagury-Partridge receives MBE

oneSentenceSummary: Walmart's AI strategies and Saks Global's financial struggles highlight contrasting developments in retail and luxury sectors amid inflation pressures.
introParagraph: Walmart implements new AI strategies to enhance its operations, while Saks Global faces bankruptcy amid ongoing inflation pressures. These developments reflect the contrasting challenges and adaptations within the retail and luxury sectors, including the impact on consumer behavior and demand for products like diamonds from De Beers.
